The main method establishes a connection to the server on localhost at port 5555, sends a text message, and then closes the connection.
main(String[]) - Static method in class Week07NetworkProgramming.MyServer
The main method initializes a server socket on port 5555, waits for a client connection, receives a message from the client, and displays it before closing all resources.
